name: Retro Series!!!
description:
Hi ,

This is a series for retro games!!!

The games will not be created from any game engines.

Everything would be hardcoded like physics , etc.

Enjoy your way through!!!

The code of the game will be provided in the download section.

[Even a crappy pc can play the games.]

Thank you,

The Low End Studio
